PaymentMethod.name: PaymentMethod
PaymentMethod.description: Represents the method that a buyer uses to compensate the seller of a good or service. Common payment methods include cash, checks, credit or debit cards, money orders, bank transfers, and online payment services.

AccountId.description: The account entity linked to this payment method.

Comments.description: Users can add comments to provide additional details about a record. Maximum of 1000 characters.

CompanyName.description: Company name for this payment method. Part of the payment methodâ€™s address.

ImplementorType.description: Shows the type of payment method.

IsAutoPayEnabled.description: Indicates whether the payment method can be used for recurring payments (True) or not (False). The default value is False.

Name.description: A unique number assigned to the payment method. Numbers start at 1000 and are read only, but administrators can change the format.

NickName.description: User-defined nickname for this payment method.

PaymentMethodAddress.description: Full address related to the alternative payment method. For more information about address fields, see Address Compound Fields.

PaymentMethodDetails.description: Optional information about the payment method type. This field is available in API version 57.0 and later.

PaymentMethodGeocodeAccuracy.description: Accuracy level of the geocode for the payment method address. An accuracy level contains information about the location of a latitude and longitude. For more information about geolocation fields, see Geolocation Compound Field.

PaymentMethodLatitude.description: Latitude of the payment method address. Used with the PaymentMethodLongitude to specify the precise geolocation of the address. For details on geolocation compound fields, see Compound Field Considerations and Limitations.

PaymentMethodLongitude.description: Longitude of the payment method address. Used with the PaymentMethodLatitude to specify the precise geolocation of the address. For details on geolocation compound fields, see Compound Field Considerations and Limitations.

PaymentMethodPostalCode.description: Part of the address for this payment method.

PaymentMethodSubType.description: More information about the payment method. For example, if the PaymentMethodType is Visa, this field can be a digital wallet. This field is available in API version 57.0 and later.

PaymentMethodType.description: The payment method used for the transaction, such as Visa, Mastercard, EPS, SepaDebit, UnionPay, and Klarna. Method types can also be direct debit payments like ACH, Becs, and BACS. This field is available in API version 57.0 and later.

SavedPaymentMethodId.description: The ID of the saved payment method record.

Status.description: The state of the payment method.
